website_summaries.verdict: Multiple components in a reasonably priced agility set, including weave poles.
pros: Uses ground stakes to hold the poles in place and secure
Kit includes carrying bags, so you can easily move your gear to any location
With multiple items in the kit, you'll be able to keep the dog from becoming bored
Reasonable price, although product quality could be higher
cons: The slalom poles are only 24 inches in height, so they aren't regulation size

website_summaries.verdict: Get started agility training your dog with this competitive agility course that comes with a dog tunnel.
pros: Designed to be sturdy and easy to set up
If you dream of teaching your dog basic agility tricks in your backyard, this is the option for you
In addition to a tunnel, you'll receive adjustable jumps, square pause box, and weave poles
cons: Some materials will need replacing while your dog learns

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set for our boxer!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set! I needed something not too expecive to have a try at agility training so we can keep up with our boxer's energy. This is a video of our very first training session with our 70lb boxer girl. She loves it and had a lot of fun! She fits through the tunnel without a problem. I like that the set has bags to store the tunnel and poles and protectors for the sharp ends of the poles. Very easy to set up, break down and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the price I've seen
customer_reviews.text: It isn't professional quality, but it is a cheap, fun little set to learn and play with! My service dog earned this as a surprise for all his hard work. He loves the tunnel! You may want to get your sewing kit and reinforce the loops that hold the stakes for the tunnel before use, and try to keep the dog out of it until they are all in the ground. Avoid using the tunnel when windy too. All in all, when it is back in stock, I plan on buying a second set. Can't beat the value!
customer_reviews.author: j.ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works for our small yard!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small backyard and this small travel set for agility is perfect to take on the go or set up for an energetic puppy/dog. It was easy to set up and take down. The dog appears to really love it and is eager to run the course. (Pup is 8 weeks old in photos)
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, I was happy to fupind this set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. I purchased it to help train my lab puppy (started at 4.5 months), we're not training for anything crazy but it's providing different actions/looks/feel and giving us something to concentrate on outside. Everything is substantial enough to work well for us, and the poles have been left set up outside for a while and look fine/are still up. Perfect for anyone who wants to try these kinds of courses without spending $100+
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great for training any dog
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a new dog our granddaughters got. a Yorkie/maltese, only 7 lbs. The kids loved this and the dog was thrilled. For everything you received this was at a great price and came in a timely manner. I did need to contact the company and customer service was excellent. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: All the poles, tunnel have a nice bag with shoulder strap for carrying
customer_reviews.text: The tunnel and agility poles are made of durable material. I love that my German Shepherd can run through it as well as my Australian Shepherd. Terrific training tools
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Pup took to the tunnel right away. Small enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Pup took to the tunnel right away. Small enough to play with inside the house. It is too wintery/slushy to test the weave poles. I am really looking forward to that.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel issue
customer_reviews.text: The weave poles and jump were as pictured. Unfortunately the tunnel lacks straps to secure it to the ground (the instructions do show straps but my tunnel does not have them). My dog will not go through the tunnel since it moves as soon as he enters it. The tunnel is useless without straps to secure it. I bought this to supplement an agility course my dog is taking, and he races through a much longer tunnel at his agility course. I would have preferred to contact PawHut before writing this review but there is no contact information directly to the manufacturer with my package.
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! great deal. Very Sturdy. Easy to set up. Exactly what I was looking for. Well worth it. Used it with my 4 month old puppy and also with a 2 year old chocolate lab.
customer_reviews.author: Fiorela

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: came super fast... dog loves it I have a Shorky. I am training him to use this! Easy to put up and move anywhere.... Sturdy enough even in rain. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: judy anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for interaction and play
customer_reviews.text: We are not serious ability people, but our two golden retrievers love play time in the yard with the equipment . Treats are involve
customer_reviews.author: Hilary W.

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: My puppy LOVES this! He’s only 16 weeks but is able to slowly do the obstacles. Some reviews said it was difficult to assemble and yes the instructions are not great but I think it’s pretty intuitive to put together without instructions. Yes it’s a bit flimsy but it’s great for a non-professional course (especially at the price). I was wondering if anyone knew where I could buy extras? Like an extra tunnel or hurtles. I’d love to add more to my puppy’s course but don’t want to add a whole set.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry-level Agility Set for your active puppy or young dog!
customer_reviews.text: A really nice Agility Set for our active Border Collie blend. Reasonable price, shipped quickly and installs without issue. Our pup took to the tunnel and the jump immediately, and she'll learn the weave poles in no time. We are thrilled with the activity, and our dog is thrilled with the ability to perform!
customer_reviews.author: Microscopeman

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought PawHut 4 Obstacle Backyard Competitive Dog Agility Training Course Kit - Blue/Yellow for our miniature puddle amusement. Few minutes to set up and ready for fun. We like the two zippered cover that allow to store easily the kit. It's a plus, you can put in your car and enjoy fun everywhere! The box arrived very fast and well packed. We recomend both, product and seller. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: simona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting out. I don't want to enter competitions or anything. I just want to have something different to keep my dogs engaged. These things are easy to use, have great carrying containers, and don't cost a fortune. The instructions for putting them together were written by someone who doesn't know English very well, but they aren't hard to figure out. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: dender

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Made with Cheap Materials
customer_reviews.text: The product comes in a brown cardboard box (i.e. no consumer packaging) so both ends of the box had opened in transit. Luckily, the items stayed in the box. Although the posts seem to be made of sturdy materials, the nylon fabric on the tunnel is extremely thin, making ripping and tearing very easy. Do not drag this tunnel across a concrete floor.
customer_reviews.author: MgH

customer_reviews.title: Be warned - many tiny bits and pieces
customer_reviews.text: It looked cheap and impossible to put together. The instructions were not helpful and some were in German! The return procedure was somewhat unfriendly and cumbersome. Would rather give it no star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Rust

customer_reviews.title: Great set; awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set for beginners like me! I wanted to try a few agility pieces with my dog without spending a small fortune. Good quality and a nice choice of equipment options. Customer service is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: tom s

customer_reviews.title: too expensive
customer_reviews.text: too expensive for the quality and im trying to complete my return since it was too small for my dog. Aosom are telling me they refunded me, which it is not on my account and now this seller Aosom are telling me i have to contact Amazon about my refund.
customer_reviews.author: lzstll

customer_reviews.title: No to bad for beginner dogs
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing was a fun project to train my dog with but it was missing parts and in the instructions it shows the tunnel having tabs to anchor it to the ground but it had nothing sewn on it so i wasn't able to use it without putting holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are not clear.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this product is that the directions were not clear. If I was not married to an engineer I'd be in deep doo-doo. I'm just starting agility and this is all new so more explicit instructions are necessary on how do put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun training for a small puppy.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves the agility obstacles!! Would buy again! Easy to set up and use. Fast shipping! Nice carry bags but it is easy to loose the black ground stake protectors. Our blue tunnel had no ties to anchor it to the ground like the diagram shows. Still like the set though and puppy caught on fast!
customer_reviews.author: Peg C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me as a beginner. later i will get something a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: We are considering agility for our Aussie mix. My 12 year old set it up. The material for the tube is pretty thin but it’s a great price/set up for starters!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and put away.
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun with my Welsh Terrior. We practice short times each week. She sleeps well after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: JHornbostel

customer_reviews.title: Great agility set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second season with this set and it is holding up quite well. I had it out all last summer and fall. My dog loves going through the course.
customer_reviews.author: Norma L. Heidrich

customer_reviews.title: She is four but seems to love running through the tunnel
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working well on teaching my dog to do agility. She is four but seems to love running through the tunnel. It has been dry so it is a little hard to get the pins and posts in the ground. There is a square cloth thing I haven't figured out yet. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good for a starter
customer_reviews.text: Other than the square ribbon provided for the dog to sit in before starting, there are only three things to set up. Wanted to try this small version before going for the full course. Recommend for people who are too lazy to create their own course. Mostly like its professional appearance which DIY's can't very well do. Not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Quality and better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: This durable dog training kit is made well and encourages children and dogs to be outside and have discipline. I think the kids were more excited than the dogs but it serves my purpose of active outside toys.
customer_reviews.author: dogsaregreat

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves the tunnel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the tunnel but my dog loves to run through it. It is small enough to use indoors. I have not yet checked out the other pieces.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Black screw in attachments keep breaking:(
customer_reviews.text: After 2 days of use. 2 of the stakes that are plastic with a nail on the bottom keep coming apart. When they are in the ground, the black plastic part comes off so you cannot remove the metal part from the ground and you cannot reassemble it, because it keeps breaking:( we bought this for my daughter for her 10th birthday and she has been disappointed in it
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: Great value starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and take down if you’re using it on your lawn and need to mow regularly. Great way to get teach a dog agility without the expense of classes.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it :-) ... it’s not hard to figure out but the directions are poorly written in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Kontikiman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to use, durable and the dogs love it and the cat loves the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality materials. My dog weighs 40 lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: Not high quality materials. My dog weighs 40 lbs, and some metal parts snapped when she bumped the bar. They are sending replacements, but concerned about the set holding up for more than a couple months. UPDATE: Arg. They sent a whole new kit for one snapped stake.
customer_reviews.author: suzombie

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy, it was affordable and easy to set up and take down. My puppy loves it and it gives him something else to do in the backyard. I usually leave it set up in the yard for about a week at a time and it hasn't gotten ruined. Highly recommend if you want something fun for your dog at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: julu

customer_reviews.title: Great, Easy Assembly, Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT little first agility set. It’s sturdy, durable and easy to work with. My 1.5 year old Aussie has been having a blast! The way the polls/rods insert into the ground are easy to manipulate and move. Easy communication with the seller and a great overall product. Good first practice agility set with a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Elise E

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this course. It’s so fun to have her run through it.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for just backyard agility. Not a complete set but close. I love it and the jumps aren't too high for a small dog or too low for a large dog. I recommend it for training, practice or beginners. Great set and easy to move. Very light, but not so light that wind can easily blow it over! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Becca W.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for first agility kit
customer_reviews.text: My corgi enjoys this agility kit. With a high energy dog this has been great for him to start his training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my dog and her little friends
customer_reviews.text: The tunnel is just the right length for my cockapoo she enjoys running fast and the overall size lets her see the light at the end easyly
customer_reviews.author: Aftetimage Photography

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FROM GREAT SELLERS!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the awesome product, and for taking your time to reply back and processing my request. I RECOMMEND for small to medium animals.. one of the best customer service , i have ever dealt with.. a 5-plus review from me and my fur babies!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Pujol

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backyard set! Perfect for my girl!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah H

customer_reviews.title: you need to have a dirt ground
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see that in the write up, but you need to have green or dirt to stack the jump and weave polls, i don't have the room for that
customer_reviews.author: LuanabBall

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: everything looks great, can not wait to set up for my dog, she will love it
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Beginner agility set
customer_reviews.text: Well priced agility set for the beginner. My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Latkovic

customer_reviews.title: My lab mix loved it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up, my puppy loved “working” with the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Stores nicely and gives our dog a lot to do
customer_reviews.text: Came home to find this set up in the lawn and my daughter diligently training her dog. Our schnoodle loves to do anything for treats so this is fun for both of them. Lots of things for him to do and great quality. It all folding into a few carry bags and my daughter can store it in her room. She's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Benton

customer_reviews.title: Item finally arrived!
customer_reviews.text: Actually arrived today despite numerous alerts that it may be lost in NH. Dog loves it! Very entertaining to watch as dog goes thru many agility challenges! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift and she loved it. Great starter kit that she can build ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and she loved it. Great starter kit that she can build on over time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bird

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My dog agility kit arrived prior to schedule, so I was happy to start practicing wirh my dog right away. Everything is easy to use and set up. Working with my dog is the tricky part!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The parts are simple, but its very functional and good for the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use outside and dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this agility kit. Bailey is a 1 year old puppy and loves to learn new things. We are having so much fun together learning in the front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My pointer/pittie mix puppy loves this set. It is very easy to put together and stores nicely in the zippered bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Great little starter kit for getting started or just having fun with agility
customer_reviews.author: Debra Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: It is ok but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: the material and construction is not as sturdy as expected. For the price, I have to like it.
customer_reviews.author: HowardHC

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and remove
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and remove. Only thing I wish I had was extra black tips for the posts that go in the ground. To easy to lose when setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good starter obstacle course. I have a German shepherd who loves to use this course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My dog loved it
customer_reviews.text: We have a border collie first time using the course . Worked great the price was very reasonable
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Directions?
customer_reviews.text: It would have been very helpful if there were more explicit directions on how to put the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Myers

customer_reviews.title: This is just perfect to begin my backyard agility training with my labradoodle
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect to begin my backyard agility training with my labradoodle. very easy for mr to set and and take down as needed. I love the fact that it comes with carrying cases for it. Great to store and preserve my set.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M Berkley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is going to have so much fun with this!! Thank You Fast Delvery!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use. It also comes in a nice carry bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She is absolutely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for low cost!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've looked for one of these and couldn't believe I got it for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great to start training my puppies. Easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Loera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a beginner agility set. Easy to put up and take down. My Aussies love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up. The sheltie is learning fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dycus

customer_reviews.title: Great cuatomer service
customer_reviews.text: These folks are really are AOSOM! One bag’s zipper arrived broken, ot was repalced immediately. I “lost” the protective covers (did not follow the instructions to remove them before putting the poles in the ground) and they even replaced them. My pup and I are havong fun learning agility. I love that it is easy to set up and can be packed away. The travel bags are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Bradley

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length for indoor obstacle course. Sufficient weight fabric for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Marler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, and I highly recommend it! It is well made, easy to set up, take down, and it's portable. We have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppy
customer_reviews.text: Love it well worth it for the money pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Suestein

customer_reviews.title: Decent product and good for human-dog bonding
customer_reviews.text: Has everything we needed. Was just looking for some fun activities to do with my dog at home. He seems to enjoy it. Dogs need mental stimulation as well as physical. This was a fun addition to our dog & handler training activities, and it actually wears him out more quickly than just playing “fetch.” I love that you can assemble the course however you want. The tunnel is plenty large for even a big dog. My dog is a 60lbs part pyrenees and he fits through it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ready, set, go!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old pup is really enjoying this tube! I have a Bell he must ring after he runs thru the tube to get a treat. Weaving comes next. This is an affordable and well made set with bags to carry everything.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kay

product_meta.title: PawHut 4PC Obstacle Dog Agility Training Course Kit Backyard Competitive Equipment- Blue/Yellow
feature_bullets: Competitive agility course enhances the bond between dog and owner
A variety of equipment types (adjustable high jump, weave poles, square pause box, round open tunnel) keeps your pets interest high throughout training
Includes ground stakes and rope for securing your obstacle course in place outdoors
Lightweight for quick and easy set up and store away with the three included carrying bags
190T polyester material resists tearing and ripping during exercise and training
